para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: You should now be able to use PyCharm to clone a GitHub repository and create a project for it. You should be able to write Python code in that project and use PyCharm to commit and push changes to your GitHub repository. You should also be able to use Gradescope to submit the code in your GitHub repository for grading.
para_sentences.para_2: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions on Ed Discussions or Teams. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_3: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Module 1 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: What's a good general approach to follow for solving problems?
What are algorithms? What are computers? What are computer languages? What is Python?
